subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets won Decker over, he said, by giving him a five-year, $36.25 million contract and penciling him in as the No. 1 receiver, after the Broncos did not re-sign him.
snippet: The Jets won Decker over, he said, by giving him a five-year, $36.25 million contract and penciling him in as the No. 1 receiver, after the Broncos did not re-sign him.
